summary: Seasoned Human Resources professional with a Masters in Human Resources and over 10 years of experience in staffing, technology recruiting, and HR in fast-paced environments, including startups, corporates, and non-profit sectors. Experienced in full life cycle recruitment, high-volume hiring, IT talent sourcing in US and India, candidate assessment, interviewing, onboarding, and working with ATS (Taleo). Proven track record of partnering with hiring managers, managing recruitment campaigns, and driving talent acquisition across diverse industries.

experience.title: Volunteer HR
experience.description: Provided recruitment support for a non-profit sector; job profiling; candidate screening; scheduling interviews; reference checks; developed global recruiting presentations for International HR teams; engaged in non-profit sector recruitment; collaboration with hiring managers and HR partners.

experience.title: Technical Recruiter
experience.description: Full life-cycle recruitment for Senior Software/Database Developers; technologies included C/C++, Windows & UNIX/Linux, .NET, Java/J2EE, SQL Server, Oracle; mentored and trained junior recruiters; top revenue generator; negotiation, interview coordination, offers, and closing.

experience.title: Technical Recruiter
experience.description: Sourced candidates via internet research, internal databases, cold calling, referrals, networking, and job fairs; recruited for Java, Microsoft technologies, Oracle, SAP, QA, Engineering; experience with Informatica and data warehousing; managed candidate logistics and client feedback.

experience.title: Senior Executive
experience.description: HR roles focusing on Recruitment and Induction; internal HR communications; HR policy liaison with payroll and benefits; recruitment and onboarding; involvement in non-technical openings; contributed to various HR projects and tasks.

education.school: Balaji Institute of Modern Management, India

education.degree: Masters in Labor Laws and Labor Welfare
